Machop Malual Chol (amụrụ n'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1998) bụ onye South Sudan na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ maka klọb Major League Soccer Atlanta United

A mụrụ ya na Khartoum, Chol na ezinụlọ ya si South Sudan kwaga United States n'afọ 2000. Ezinụlọ ya biri na Clarkston, Georgia, ebe ọ mụtara ịgba bọọlụ.  Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na klọb ndị ntorobịa DDYSC Wolves tupu ọ nweta ohere na Atlanta United academy na 2016.

N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2017, Chol malitere ịgba bọọlụ kọleji maka Wake Forest Demon Deacons. O mere nke mbụ ya maka Demon Deacons na 25 Ọgọstụ megide Rutgers Scarlet Knights ebe ọ gbara goolu mbụ ya. N'oge niile ọ nọ na Wake Forest, Chol gbara goolu iri na atọ na egwuregwu iri isii na ise.
Na 19 Jenụwarị 2021, Chol bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta onye egwuregwu na Major League Soccer club Atlanta United. O mere nke mbụ ya na 17 Eprel 2021 megide Orlando City, na-abịa dị ka onye nnọchi anya.
Chol mere nke mbụ ya na mba South Sudan na 27 Jenụwarị 2022 na mmeri enyi na enyi na Uzbekistan.
